UnlockedDescription.default: Complete at least 10 unique premium deliveries in each order category with an evaluation of "Legend," "Legend of Legends," or "Legend of Legends of Legends."
UnlockedDescription.de:
Schließe in jeder Auftragskategorie mindestens 10 einzelne Premiumlieferungen mit der Bewertung
„Legend“, „Legend of Legends“ oder „Legend of Legends of Legends“ ab.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Completa al menos 10 entregas premium únicas en cada categoría de encargos con una evaluación de "Legend", "Legend of Legends" o "Legend of Legends of Legends".
UnlockedDescription.es-MX: Completa por lo menos 10 envíos premium únicos en cada categoría de pedido con una evaluación de "Legend", "Legend of Legends" o "Legend of Legends of Legends".
UnlockedDescription.en: Complete at least 10 unique premium deliveries in each order category with an evaluation of "Legend," "Legend of Legends," or "Legend of Legends of Legends."
UnlockedDescription.fr:
Terminez au moins 10 livraisons premium uniques dans chaque catégorie de commande avec une évaluation
« Legend », « Legend of Legends » ou « Legend of Legends of Legends ».
UnlockedDescription.ko: 각 카테고리에서 서로 다른 프리미엄 배송을 10회 완료해서 "Legend", "Legend of Legends", 또는 "Legend of Legends of Legends" 평가를 받았다.
UnlockedDescription.it: Completa almeno 10 consegne premium uniche con valutazione "Legend", "Legend of Legends", o "Legend of Legends of Legends" in ogni categoria di ordine.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ukończ co najmniej 10 różnych dostaw premium w każdej kategorii zlecenia z oceną „Legend”, „Legend of Legends” lub „Legend of Legends of Legends”.
UnlockedDescription.ja: "指名なし依頼[プレミアム配送]"を、Legend、Legend of Legends、もしくはLegend of Legends of Legends評価でクリアすることを、各評価軸で10種類以上別々の依頼で行う
UnlockedDescription.ru: Выполнить не менее 10 разных особых доставок в каждой категории, получив оценку «Фантастика», «Просто невероятно» или «Невероятно в квадрате».
UnlockedDescription.pt-BR: Em cada categoria de pedido, conclua pelo menos 10 entregas especiais exclusivas com a avaliação de "Legend", "Legend of Legends" ou "Legend of Legends of Legends".
UnlockedDescription.zh: 完成各个类别至少10份不同的高级配送订单，且获得“Legend”、“Legend of Legends”或“Legend of Legends of Legends”的评价。
UnlockedDescription.tr: Her sipariş kategorisinde en az 10 eşsiz ayrıcalıklı teslimatı, "Legend", "Legend of Legends" veya "Legend of Legends of Legends" derecesiyle tamamla.
UnlockedDescription.zh-Hant: 完成每個訂單類別至少10項特殊頂級配送，且獲得「Legend」、「Legend of Legends」或「Legend of Legends of Legends」評價。
